title: Rock and Roll Never Forgets Tour 2013
description:
Event Details:

Bob Seger & The Silver Bullet Band

Wed Mar 27
7:30PM

Rogers Arena
800 Griffiths Way
Vancouver BC

Bob Seger & The Silver Bullet Band will return to the road this Spring for the first leg of their Rock And Roll Never Forgets 2013 Tour. The tour will kick off February 27th in Toledo, OH and include stops in Seattle, Portland, Denver, Green Bay, and Grand Rapids. The tour will also feature a series of dates in Canada including Calgary, Edmonton, Saskatoon, Vancouver, and Winnipeg. Seger has written and recorded many timeless classics through his career including Turn The Page, Night Moves, Mainstreet, Against The Wind,
